00004 //
00005 // GSEvent is an undeclared object. We don't need to use it ourselves but some
00006 // Apple APIs (UIScrollView in particular) require the x and y fields to be present.
00007 //
00008 @interface GSEventProxy : NSObject
00009 {
00010 @public
00011         int ignored1[5];
00012         float x;
00013         float y;
00014         int ignored2[24];
00015 }
00016 @end
00017 @implementation GSEventProxy
00018 @end
00019 
00020 //
00021 // PublicEvent
00022 //
00023 // A dummy class used to gain access to UIEvent's private member variables.
00024 // If UIEvent changes at all, this will break.
00025 //
00026 @interface PublicEvent : NSObject
00027 {
00028 @public
00029     GSEventProxy           *_event;
00030     NSTimeInterval          _timestamp;
00031     NSMutableSet           *_touches;
00032     CFMutableDictionaryRef  _keyedTouches;
00033 }
00034 @end
00035 
00036 @implementation PublicEvent
00037 @end

00042 +(void)runSpecsAfterDelay:(int)seconds {
00043         [NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds target:self selector:@selector(runSpecs) userInfo:nil repeats:NO];

00050 +(void)runSpec:(NSString *)specName example:(NSString *)exampleName afterDelay:(int)seconds {
00051         [NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds target:self selector:@selector(runSpecExample:) userInfo:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:specName, exampleName, nil] repeats:NO];
00052 }

00054 +(void)runSpecs {
00055         NSArray *specClasses = [self specClasses];
00056         [self runSpecClasses:specClasses];
00057 }
00058 
00059 +(void)runSpec:(NSTimer *)timer {
00060         Class *class = NSClassFromString(timer.userInfo);
00061         [self runSpecClasses:[NSArray arrayWithObject:class]];
00062 }
00063 
00064 +(void)runSpecExample:(NSTimer *)timer {
00065         [self swizzleUIKit];
00066         Class *class = NSClassFromString([timer.userInfo objectAtIndex:0]);
00067         NSString *exampleName = [timer.userInfo objectAtIndex:1];
00068         NSMutableArray *errors = [NSMutableArray array];
00069         NSDate *start = [NSDate date];
00070         [self runExamples:[NSArray arrayWithObject:exampleName] onSpec:class errors:errors];
00071         [self logSpec:errors finishTime:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%f", fabsf([start timeIntervalSinceNow])] examplesCount:@"1"];
00072 }
00073 
00074 +(void)runSpecClasses:(NSArray *)specClasses {
00075         [self swizzleUIKit];
00076         if (specClasses.count == 0) return;
00077         
00078         NSMutableArray *errors = [NSMutableArray array];
00079         
00080         NSDate *start = [NSDate date];
00081         int examplesCount = 0;
00082         for (Class *class in specClasses) {
00083                 NSArray *examples = [self examplesForSpecClass:class];
00084                 if (examples.count == 0) continue;
00085                 examplesCount = examplesCount + examples.count;
00086                 [self runExamples:examples onSpec:class errors:errors];
00087         }
00088         [self logSpec:errors finishTime:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%f", fabsf([start timeIntervalSinceNow])] examplesCount:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%i", examplesCount]];
00089 }
00090 
00091 +(void)logSpec:(NSArray *)errors finishTime:(NSString *)finishTime examplesCount:(NSString *)examplesCount {
00092         NSMutableString *log = [NSMutableString string];
00093         if (errors.count > 0) {
00094                 int count = 0;
00095                 for (NSString *error in errors) {
00096                         [log appendFormat:@"\n\n%i)", ++count];
00097                         [log appendFormat:@"\n%@", error];
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         [log appendFormat:@"\n\nFinished in %@ seconds", finishTime];
00101         
00102         [log appendFormat:@"\n\n%@ examples %i failures", examplesCount, errors.count];
00103         NSLog(log);
00104 }
00105 
00106 +(void)runExamples:(NSArray *)examples onSpec:(Class *)class errors:(NSMutableArray *)errors {
00107         NSLog(@"\n%@", NSStringFromClass(class));
00108         UISpec *spec = [[[class alloc] init] autorelease];
00109         if ([spec respondsToSelector:@selector(beforeAll)]) {
00110                 @try {
00111                         [spec beforeAll];
00112                 } @catch (NSException *exception) {
00113                         NSString *error = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ in %@ beforeAll \n %@", exception.name, class, exception.reason];
00114                         [errors addObject:error];
00115                 }
00116         }
00117         for (NSString *exampleName in examples) {
00118                 if ([spec respondsToSelector:@selector(before)]) {
00119                         @try {
00120                                 [spec before];
00121                         } @catch (NSException *exception) {
00122                                 NSString *error = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ in %@ before %@ \n %@", exception.name, class, exampleName, exception.reason];
00123                                 [errors addObject:error];
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 @try {
00127                         NSLog(@"\n- %@", exampleName);
00128                         [spec performSelector:NSSelectorFromString(exampleName)];
00129                 } @catch (NSException *exception) {
00130                         NSString *error = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ %@ FAILED \n%@", class, exampleName, exception.reason];
00131                         [errors addObject:error];
00132                 }
00133                 if ([spec respondsToSelector:@selector(after)]) {
00134                         @try {
00135                                 [spec after];
00136                         } @catch (NSException *exception) {
00137                                 NSString *error = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ in %@ after %@ \n %@", exception.name, class, exampleName, exception.reason];
00138                                 [errors addObject:error];
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141         }
00142         if ([spec respondsToSelector:@selector(afterAll)]) {
00143                 @try {
00144                         [spec afterAll];
00145                 } @catch (NSException *exception) {
00146                         NSString *error = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ in %@ afterAll \n %@", exception.name, class, exception.reason];
00147                         [errors addObject:error];
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 }
00151 
00152 +(NSArray *)examplesForSpecClass:(Class *)specClass {
00153         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00154         unsigned int methodCount;
00155         Method *methods = class_copyMethodList(specClass, &methodCount);
00156         for (size_t i = 0; i < methodCount; ++i) {
00157                 Method method = methods[i];
00158                 SEL selector = method_getName(method);
00159                 NSString *selectorName = NSStringFromSelector(selector);
00160                 if ([selectorName hasPrefix:@"it"]) {
00161                         [array addObject:selectorName];
00162                 }
00163         }
00164         return array;
00165 }
00166 
00167 +(BOOL)isASpec:(Class)class {
00168         //Class spec = NSClassFromString(@"UISpec");
00169         while (class) {
00170                 if (class_conformsToProtocol(class, NSProtocolFromString(@"UISpec"))) {
00171                         return YES;
00172                 }
00173                 class = class_getSuperclass(class);
00174         }
00175         return NO;
00176 }

00178 
00179 +(NSArray*)specClasses {
00180         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00181     int numClasses = objc_getClassList(NULL, 0);
00182     if (numClasses > 0) {
00183         Class *classes = malloc(sizeof(Class) * numClasses);
00184         (void) objc_getClassList (classes, numClasses);
00185         int i;
00186         for (i = 0; i < numClasses; i++) {
00187             Class *c = classes[i];
00188                         if ([self isASpec:c]) {
00189                                 [array addObject:c];
00190                         }
00191         }
00192         free(classes);
00193     }
00194         return array;
00195 }

00199 - (id)initWithTouch:(UITouch *)touch
00200 {
00201         self = [super init];
00202         if (self != nil)
00203         {
00204                 PublicEvent *publicEvent = (PublicEvent *)self;
00205                 publicEvent->_touches = [[NSMutableSet alloc] initWithObjects:&touch count:1];
00206                 publicEvent->_timestamp = [NSDate timeIntervalSinceReferenceDate];
00207                 
00208                 CGPoint location = [touch locationInView:touch.window];
00209                 
00210                 publicEvent->_event = [[GSEventProxy alloc] init];
00211                 publicEvent->_event->x = location.x;
00212                 publicEvent->_event->y = location.y;
00213                 
00214                 CFMutableDictionaryRef dict =
00215                 CFDictionaryCreateMutable(
00216                                                                   kCFAllocatorDefault,
00217                                                                   0,
00218                                                                   &kCFTypeDictionaryKeyCallBacks,
00219                                                                   &kCFTypeDictionaryValueCallBacks);
00220                 
00221                 CFDictionaryAddValue(dict, touch.view, publicEvent->_touches);
00222                 CFDictionaryAddValue(dict, touch.window, publicEvent->_touches);
00223                 
00224                 publicEvent->_keyedTouches = dict;
00225         }
00226         return self;
00227 }

00229 -(void)noDealloc {
00230         //so there is no crash
00231 }
00232 
00233 +(void)swizzleUIKit {   
00234         class_addMethod(NSClassFromString(@"UITouchesEvent"), @selector(initWithTouch:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(initWithTouch:))), "@@:@");
00235         method_setImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod(NSClassFromString(@"UITouchesEvent"), @selector(dealloc)), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(noDealloc))));
00236         //      class_addMethod([UIView class], @selector(methodSignatureForSelector:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(methodSignatureForSelector:))), "@@:@");
00237 //      class_addMethod([UIView class], @selector(forwardInvocation:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(forwardInvocation:))), "v@:@");
00238 //      class_addMethod([UIView class], @selector(traverse:class:properties:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(traverse:class:properties:))), "@@:@@@");
00239 //      class_addMethod([UIView class], @selector(touch), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(touch))), "v@:");
00240 //      class_addMethod([UIApplication class], @selector(methodSignatureForSelector:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(methodSignatureForSelector:))), "@@:@");
00241 //      class_addMethod([UIApplication class], @selector(forwardInvocation:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(forwardInvocation:))), "v@:@");
00242 //      class_addMethod([UIApplication class], @selector(traverse:class:properties:), method_getImplementation(class_getInstanceMethod([UISpec class], @selector(traverse:class:properties:))), "@@:@@@");
00243 }
00244 
00245 +(void)swizzleMethodOnClass:(Class)targetClass originalSelector:(SEL)originalSelector fromClass:(Class)fromClass alternateSelector:(SEL)alternateSelector {
00246     Method originalMethod = nil, alternateMethod = nil;
00247         
00248     // First, look for the methods
00249     originalMethod = class_getInstanceMethod(targetClass, originalSelector);
00250     alternateMethod = class_getInstanceMethod(fromClass, alternateSelector);
00251     
00252     // If both are found, swizzle them
00253     if (originalMethod != nil && alternateMethod != nil) {
00254                 IMP originalImplementation = method_getImplementation(originalMethod);
00255                 IMP alternateImplementation = method_getImplementation(alternateMethod);
00256                 method_setImplementation(originalMethod, alternateImplementation);
00257                 method_setImplementation(alternateMethod, originalImplementation);
00258         }
00259 }
